bullets: Car Seat Stage: Rear-facing from 4-35 pounds and up to 32 inches
Car Seat Safety Features: Recline leveling system with dual bubble level indicators, 5-Point Adjustable Harness with one-hand adjustment, 6-position crotch belt adjustment, EPS Energy absorbing foam

Stroller Seat Adjustments: Comfort Cabin with extra-large UPF 50+ canopy with extended sun visor and Peek-A-Boo window.  Enhanced quick release front wheel for improved stability and safety (Upgrade wheel design compared to our Cityscape Jogger, Pathway Jogger, and Expedition Jogger)
Includes: RaceTec Jogger Stroller and car seat combination, Ally™ Infant Car Seat and Base, and extra-large basket with rear access to hold parent’s key essentials
Includes:  Modern designed parent console with cell phone positioner and 2 deep cup holders.  Swing away child tray with 2 cup holders makes getting child in and out of the stroller easily
description: The Baby TrendÂ® ExpeditionÂ® Race Tecâ¢ Jogger provides comfort, quality, and style for you and your little one. Mom and dad will enjoy Parent Premiums with the ergonomic rubber handlebar, extra-large basket with wide opening to hold key essentials, and the modern designed parent console with cell phone positioner and two deep cup holders.  Your child will appreciate the large UPF 50+ canopy shade with extended sun visor, 5-point safety harness with comfort shoulder strap covers, and 2 cup holders on the child tray. The padded seat also allows multiple reclining positions to ensure comfort and smooth rides.  Our ExpeditionÂ® Race Tecâ¢ Jogger implements upgraded quick release front wheel that provides stability and safety when you jog. Now with this wheel design and the raised rubber handlebar, you and your little one can decide either you want to go off the beaten path or a quick morning jog. The trigger fold also makes the storage and transport much easier.  Turn the Jogger into a travel system by combining the jogger with the included Allyâ¢ 35 Infant Car Seat. The Allyâ¢ features higher, deeper side wings with EPS foam for optimal side impact protection, a 5-point safety harness and a 4-position height adjustable base. It accepts infants from 4-35 lbs.
features: Dimensions (Overall): 41 Inches (H) x 24 Inches (W) x 48 Inches (D)
Dimensions (Collapsed): 18 Inches (H) x 24 Inches (W) x 36 Inches (D)
Features: Infant Car Seat Compatible, Adjustable Handle, LATCH Compatible
Assembly Details: Adult Assembly Required, Tools Not Provided
Industry or Government Certifications: JPMA Certified
Care & Cleaning: Spot or Wipe Clean
Warranty: 1 Year Limited Warranty. To obtain a copy of the manufacturer's or supplier's warranty for this item prior to purchasing the item, please call Target Guest Services at 1-800-591-3869

questions.question_summary: Bought this for my new grand baby. Where can I get an extra base? I desperately need one!

The stroller is great. The base was difficult to install. We even brought it to the fire department and they could only get it to install correctly on 2 of the 4 settings, so we will only be able to use it through 20ish pounds. Also, the base is sold out everywhere and has been all year.
The front wheel doesn’t drive straight and it gets stuck when turning/pulls. It doesn’t have to do with the front wheel locking mechanism.
Have already used this stroller going over rocks, up hills, over grass. Strolls smoothly. I haven’t used it as a jogger, only for walks. Its very easy to fold and was surprised how compact it was.

I would not recommend! This set is so cheaply made. The car seat has plastic buckles that you have to hold together to click in, instead of the metal ones that can be done separately which is so much easier. Also it's so incredibly hard to Tighten or even loosen the car seat straps. The stroller wheel keeps going flat for no reason at all. It's very hard to open it up and close it just the right way so it compacts fully so it can fit into my trunk. It's so wide/thick.

answers.answer_summary: Hi Daphne! We are very sorry to hear of your experience with our Expedition Race Tec Jogger Travel System. Please contact our customer service team at 1-800-328-7363 available Monday through Friday, 8 am to 4:30 pm PST and we will be happy to assist you.

questions.question_summary: It was okay for the price but for not much more you can get a graco which all around is much better & the company replaces/handles issues SO well! This car seat is heavy and can be a pain to use! It works and is okay but would recommend others first!

answers.answer_summary: Hi Olivia! We are very sorry to hear of your experience with our Expedition Race Tec Jogger Travel System. Please contact our customer service team at 1-800-328-7363 available Monday through Friday, 8 am to 4:30 pm PST and we will be happy to assist you.

questions.question_summary: I was given this stroller for my newest baby,but the tires were flat. I am not sure how to add air.I was still able to take my 1yr for a ride...two houses down and it rides as if the tires are not flat. I would love to find a car seat that fits this, i do have theBaby Trend EZ Ride 35 Travel System, Doodle Dots but i am not sure if it will fit. I would hope it does or i'll have to purchase a stroller,maybe a stroller.

I picked this item out for my baby registry based on several good reviews, and after receiving it as a gift, I immediately regretted it. The straps are incredibly difficult to tighten on both the car seat and the stroller. The material feels cheap and the canopy’s are loud and clunky. The car seat base was almost impossible to tighten in both mine and my husbands vehicle. I ended up returning it for a Graco. Don’t waste your time with this.
